thread.title: You Can Now Create A Pizza Wedding Registry With Domino's
thread.title_full: You Can Now Create A Pizza Wedding Registry With Domino's

author: Suzy Strutner
title: You Can Now Create A Pizza Wedding Registry With Domino's
text:
You Can Now Create A Pizza Wedding Registry With Domino's For the cheesiest couples. üíï üçï 02/08/2017 06:50 pm ET Suzy Strutner Associate Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post 
As a wedding guest, it can be tough to decide on a gift the newlyweds will actually use . But this one is a guaranteed winner, and it doesn‚Äôt cost much dough. 
Domino‚Äôs Pizza has created a wedding registry where couples can request the gift of pizza for before, during or after their big day. This may be the easiest cheesiest wedding decision you‚Äôll ever make: Dominos Only the classiest brides eat Domino's. Dominos Pizzas for the bachelor party or perhaps a late-night snack in the wedding suite? 
The Domino‚Äôs Wedding Registry works like most others : Couples simply log in and create a profile with the items they want. Every item comes as a standard Domino‚Äôs gift card , but the registry has given them clever names as suggestions for how they should be used: there‚Äôs a ‚ÄúCater the Bachelorette Party‚Äù gift card (intended for pizza during pre-wedding festivities), a ‚ÄúDancing With My Slice‚Äù gift card (for delivery during the reception) and an ‚ÄúAn Excuse Not to Cook‚Äù gift card (for married nights when adulting doesn‚Äôt come easy). 
The gift cards range from $15 to $100, and guests can send them online or print them out and deliver in person. 
How doughlightful.
